Pangolin
Pangolin is a lightweight rapid development library for managing OpenGL display / interaction and video input

44 
45 struct Marker
46 {
47  enum Direction
48  {
49  Horizontal,
50  Vertical
51  };
52 
53  enum Equality
54  {
55  LessThan = -1,
56  Equal = 0,
57  GreaterThan = 1
58  };
59 
60  Marker(Direction d, float value, Equality leg = Equal, Colour c = Colour() )
61  : direction(d), value(value), leg(leg), colour(c)
62  {
63  }
64 
65  Direction direction;
66  float value;
67  Equality leg;
68  Colour colour;
69 };

134  {
135  PlotAttrib(std::string name, int plot_id, int location = -1)
136  : name(name), plot_id(plot_id), location(location) { }

157  struct PANGOLIN_EXPORT PlotImplicit
158  {
159  // Assign to gl_FragColor
160  void CreatePlot(const std::string& code);
161 
162  // Expression uses x,y and assignes colours [0,1] to r,g,b,a
163  void CreateColouredPlot(const std::string& code);
164 
165  // Expression uses x,y and evaluates to true/false;
166  void CreateInequality(const std::string& ie, Colour c);
167 
168  // Expression uses x,y and evaluates to a number
169  void CreateDistancePlot(const std::string& dist);
170 
171  GlSlProgram prog;
172  };
